game.name: Frontline Command
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Frontline Command is a tactical auto-battler where you draft your squad of soldiers to victory! Use strategy and combat skills to outsmart your opponents as you navigate challenging battlefield scenarios.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Frontline Command is a tactical auto-battler where you draft your squad of soldiers to victory! Use strategy and combat skills to outsmart your opponents as you navigate challenging battlefield scenarios.
